title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered SaaS Observability using OpenSearch  (ISV313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 OpenSearch 实现 AI 驱动的 SaaS 可观测性 (ISV313)
abstract: SaaS providers struggle with observability at scale, balancing costs, combining cross-tenant and single-tenant data, and surfacing actionable insights. In this code talk, learn how to build next-generation observability for your SaaS platform using semantic search, agent-led search, and other AI-powered techniques. We’ll dive deep on index mappings, ingestion flows, and query patterns, live coding a solution using Amazon OpenSearch Service.
abstract_cn: SaaS 提供商在大规模可观测性方面面临挑战,需要平衡成本、整合跨租户和单租户数据,并提供可操作的洞察。在本次代码讲座中,了解如何使用语义搜索、智能体引导搜索和其他 AI 驱动技术为您的 SaaS 平台构建下一代可观测性。我们将深入探讨索引映射、数据摄取流程和查询模式,并使用 Amazon OpenSearch Service 现场编写解决方案。
